participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and sensitive, with a strong desire to express herself through music and art.
participant_1.background: I'm afraid of disappointing my family. I use my iPhone 7 to secretly call my boyfriend when I'm out with my parents. I am passionate about making music and expressing myself through it. My horse never talks back to me. I went to Japan during college and stayed with a host family.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and adventurous, enjoys spending time outdoors and with family.
participant_2.background: I am 150 lbs, but I am not a stickler for my weight. I just bought my first home. I showed a group of tourists the best spots to view the Grand Canyon. I live a very active life, but I always make time for my family. I also like ice cream.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking! I just got back from a walk in the park with my dog.
Oh that sounds nice! I love walking my dogs in the park too. What breed is your dog?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy. He is a very good boy.
Aw I love golden retrievers! They are so friendly. Do you have any other pets?
Yes, I have a horse named Shadow. He is my best friend.
That's awesome! I would love to have a horse one day.
They are great pets but they require a lot of attention and care.
I know, but I think it would be worth it.
I think so too! What do you do for fun?
I like to go hiking, biking, and fishing. I also like to go to the movies and play video games.
Those sound like fun activities! I like to do a lot of the same things.
That's great! We should hang out sometime and do some of those things together.
That would be fun! I would love to get to know you better.
Great! I'll send you my number so we can make plans.
